Features of the #1 API for UPI payment

Multi-Bank Support

Access multiple UPI-enabled banks through a single integration. With our API you can offer flexibility to your customers.

User-Friendly Dashboard

Access intuitive dashboard analytics for real-time insights into transactions. Handle settlements and customer behavior with one click operation.

Multi-Language and Multi-Currency Support

Reach an international customer base with support for multiple languages and currencies. Choose our API to enhance accessibility and convenience.

Easy Authentication

Enhance security with seamless OTP verification for every transaction. Our API is robust to provide instant OTP delivery to the registered mobile numbers.

Real-Time Transaction Updates

Provide instant updates on transaction status and confirmations. Manage directness in each transaction.

Tokenization for Security

Utilize tokenization to securely handle customer payment information. Our API offers PCI DSS compliance and peace of mind.

Use cases for our UPI ID verification API

We have extensive experience in developing ID verification API that finds application in various scenarios across digital payment platforms

“Our verification API is gaining popularity as it enhances transaction security. Get a free demo on how it reduces errors and improves user confidence in digital payments.”

Merchant Payments

Facilitates secure payments to merchants by verifying the correctness of their UPI IDs, reducing the risk of payment errors.

Subscription Services

Verifies UPI IDs for recurring payments, ensuring that subscriptions are renewed accurately and securely.

Bill Payments

Verify the UPI ID of telecom providers before making payments. You can ensure that payments are directed to the correct recipient.

Donations

Validate the UPI IDs of charitable organizations so that donations are securely transferred to legitimate entities.

E-commerce Transactions

Verifies UPI IDs during checkout, ensuring that payments are directed to the correct seller or platform, enhancing transaction security.

Loan Disbursements

Ensures that loan amounts are disbursed securely to verified UPI IDs of borrowers, minimizing transaction risks.

How Long Do We Take to Develop Your UPI Payment Gateway API?

The large team of tech experts are Scriza take pride in delivering rapid and reliable UPI API solutions

“Our typical development timeline ensures you can start processing payments efficiently:”

Initial Consultation

We start with a detailed discussion to grasp your API integration requirements.

Planning and Design

Our expert team designs a customized solution tailored to your specifications. The planning and design phase usually takes 1 week.

Development

The development phase begins, where our developers work diligently to implement the UPI payment gateway API. This typically takes 2 weeks as per the project scope.

Testing and Quality Assurance

We deploy the API only when we conduct rigorous testing. We test for 2 weeks that everything functions flawlessly and meets your expectations.

Deployment and Support

When the testing is complete and you're satisfied with the results, we deploy the API. We do not stop here as we have a dedicated team to offer ongoing support.

Frequently Asked Questions

Common questions about our UPI Collection API

“Find answers to the most frequently asked questions about our UPI Collection API solutions.”

What is UPI Collection API and how does it work?

UPI Collection API allows businesses to accept payments directly from customers' bank accounts through UPI apps like Google Pay, PhonePe, and Paytm. It integrates with your system to process payments securely without requiring card details.

How long does it take to integrate UPI Collection API?

Our typical integration timeline is 5 weeks total: 1 week for planning and design, 2 weeks for development, and 2 weeks for testing and quality assurance. We provide comprehensive support throughout the process.

Which UPI apps are supported by your API?

Our UPI Collection API supports all major UPI apps including Google Pay, PhonePe, Paytm, Amazon Pay, WhatsApp Pay, BHIM, and all bank UPI apps. We provide multi-bank support through a single integration.

What are the transaction fees for UPI Collection API?

Our UPI Collection API offers 50% lower transaction costs compared to traditional payment methods. Fees vary based on transaction volume and business requirements. Contact us for detailed pricing information.

Is the UPI Collection API secure for processing payments?

Yes, our UPI Collection API uses bank-grade security with two-factor authentication, encryption, tokenization, and PCI DSS compliance. We maintain 99.99% uptime with robust fraud detection systems.
